text: <@UB690RZA7> looks great! How was your experience building the site using Themes?

good! having the modules encapsulated was a huge plus. it allows our team to know which modules are part of the theme without prepending the theme name to all the modules. the CLI was huge for copying fields and meta json across modules. i didn't use drag and drop areas...still not sold on that quite yet, but will be taking a deeper dive into that soon.
